name: A Grave Ghost
description:
A grave ghost.

Made for a wizard jam.

WASD + Space Bar

Music from the cool dude Patrick R on Thumbs forums, and here's his bandcamp: http://patrick-ripoll.bandcamp.com/

Title: https://soundcloud.com/wizard-jam-sound-bank/hype-...

Level: https://soundcloud.com/wizard-jam-sound-bank/spira...

(Once in the game type "fucknick" (no space, just those eight letters) for silly secret (not secret) surprise.)
